spec_data.Name: twirssi
spec_data.Description:
Twirssi allows you interact with Twitter and Identi.ca from Irssi. It can
handle tweets and direct messages (DMs), and supports multiple accounts on
either Twitter or Identi.ca.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 12:17:53 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: An Irssi script to interact with Twitter
